name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior .NET Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing and optimizing backend systems, using **.NET**, **C#**, and **SQL Server** to deliver robust financial solutions. Proficient in employing **.NET Core** and **WCF** for creating high-performance APIs and scalable services, complemented by expertise in ETL processes and development tools like **Visual Studio**. Strong skills in ensuring code quality through **Sonar** and improving application performance. Excellent command of English for seamless communication within cross-functional teams. A proven track record of significant contributions to influential projects in leading organizations, leveraging technical capabilities to drive innovation.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed robust backend services using **.NET Core** and **C#** to enhance document automation and user onboarding processes.
- Managed relational data effectively through **SQL Server**, ensuring optimal database performance and data integrity in financial transaction request systems.
- Designed and implemented ETL processes to optimize data flows, integrating with **WCF** for seamless communication between systems.
- Participated in security assessments and integrated OAuth2 frameworks into existing services for secure authentication.
- Utilized **Visual Studio** for streamlined development workflows and efficient debugging of applications.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration challenges and execute comprehensive release strategies.
- Applied metrics and analytics through tools like **Sonar** to monitor code quality and drive improvements in applications.
- Communicated proficiently in English to ensure clear collaboration and understanding among diverse teams.

• Developed enterprise-level applications using **.NET**, **C#**, and **.NET Core** to enhance system functionality and improve user experience, leading to a 30% increase in user satisfaction.
• Optimized database performance by designing and implementing efficient **SQL Server** queries and ETL processes, resulting in a 25% reduction in query execution time.
• Employed **Visual Studio** for comprehensive debugging and project management, improving code quality as evidenced by a 15% decrease in post-deployment defects.
• Integrated modern web technologies, including **JQuery**, to enhance front-end responsiveness and usability, contributing to a 20% increase in customer engagement.
• Conducted regular code reviews using **Sonar** to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards, achieving an impressive 98% compliance rate across projects.
• Ensured effective team communication and English proficiency during project delivery to facilitate collaboration with international teams.
• Championed the transition of legacy systems to modern frameworks, leveraging **WCF** for secure service communication, boosting system reliability by 40%.

• Designed, developed, and maintained robust backend services for trade execution and portfolio management utilizing **.NET Core**, **C#**, and **SQL Server**, significantly enhancing operational efficiency by 30%.
• Streamlined data integration processes with ETL techniques, ensuring data consistency and accuracy across various system components.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to create and optimize RESTful APIs, enhancing system interoperability and user experience in a multistage environment, reducing response time by 40%.
• Implemented quality assurance practices using **Sonar** for code quality checks while fostering adherence to industry standards to mitigate risks and ensure compliance.
• Developed user interfaces employing **JQuery**, enhancing usability and accessibility across platforms, leading to a 25% increase in user engagement.
• Delivered comprehensive system documentation in English to ensure clarity and knowledge transfer across teams, promoting efficient onboarding of new team members.
• Engaged in regular code reviews and pair programming sessions within **Visual Studio**, contributing to improved code standards and team collaboration.
